content: --पदः {1} a community, race, nation; <ls>Y. 1. 361</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {2} a kingdom, an empire, an inhabited country; जनपदे न गदः पदमादधौ <ls>R. 9. 4</ls>; दाक्षिणात्ये जनपदे <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; <ls>Me. 48.</ls> {3} the country (<ab>opp.</ab> the town पुर, नगर); जनपदवधूलोचनैः पीयमानः <ls>Me. 16.</ls> {4} the people, subjects (<ab>opp.</ab> the sovereign); जनपदहितकर्ता त्यज्यते पार्थिवेन <ls>Pt. 1. 131.</ls> {5} mankind.
